verses.kjv: Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God: therefore the world knoweth us not, because it knew him not.
verses.web: See how great a love the Father has given to us, that we should be called children of God! For this cause the world doesn’t know us, because it didn’t know him.
verses.ct: Look at how incredible the Father's love for us is — he calls us his own children, and that's exactly what we are! The reason the world doesn't recognize us is that it never recognized him either.

verses.kjv: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.
verses.web: Beloved, now we are children of God. It is not yet revealed what we will be; but we know that when he is revealed, we will be like him; for we will see him just as he is.
verses.ct: Dear friends, right now we are already God's children. What we'll ultimately become hasn't been revealed yet, but we know this: when Christ appears, we will be like him, because we'll see him exactly as he is.

verses.kjv: And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself, even as he is pure.
verses.web: Everyone who has this hope set on him purifies himself, even as he is pure.
verses.ct: Everyone who holds on to this hope purifies themselves, just as he is pure.

verses.kjv: Whosoever committeth sin transgresseth also the law: for sin is the transgression of the law.
verses.web: Everyone who sins also commits lawlessness. Sin is lawlessness.
verses.ct: Everyone who sins is breaking God's law, because sin is, by definition, lawlessness.

verses.kjv: And ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins; and in him is no sin.
verses.web: You know that he was revealed to take away our sins, and no sin is in him.
verses.ct: You know that Christ appeared to take away our sins, and there is no sin in him at all.

verses.kjv: Whosoever abideth in him sinneth not: whosoever sinneth hath not seen him, neither known him.
verses.web: Whoever remains in him doesn’t sin. Whoever sins hasn’t seen him and doesn’t know him.
verses.ct: No one who remains in him keeps on sinning. Anyone who keeps on sinning has never truly seen him or known him.

verses.kjv: Little children, let no man deceive you: he that doeth righteousness is righteous, even as he is righteous.
verses.web: Little children, let no one lead you astray. He who does righteousness is righteous, even as he is righteous.
verses.ct: Dear children, don't let anyone mislead you. The person who does what is right is righteous, just as Christ is righteous.

verses.kjv: He that committeth sin is of the devil; for the devil sinneth from the beginning. For this purpose the Son of God was manifested, that he might destroy the works of the devil.
verses.web: He who sins is of the devil, for the devil has been sinning from the beginning. To this end the Son of God was revealed: that he might destroy the works of the devil.
verses.ct: The person who keeps sinning belongs to the devil, because the devil has been sinning from the very beginning. This is exactly why the Son of God appeared — to destroy the devil's work.

verses.kjv: Whosoever is born of God doth not commit sin; for his seed remaineth in him: and he cannot sin, because he is born of God.
verses.web: Whoever is born of God doesn’t commit sin, because his seed remains in him, and he can’t sin, because he is born of God.
verses.ct: No one who is born of God makes a practice of sinning, because God's seed remains in them. They cannot go on sinning, because they have been born of God.

verses.kjv: In this the children of God are manifest, and the children of the devil: whosoever doeth not righteousness is not of God, neither he that loveth not his brother.
verses.web: In this the children of God are revealed, and the children of the devil. Whoever doesn’t do righteousness is not of God, neither is he who doesn’t love his brother.
verses.ct: This is how you can tell God's children apart from the devil's children: anyone who doesn't do what is right does not belong to God, and neither does anyone who doesn't love their brother or sister.

verses.kjv: For this is the message that ye heard from the beginning, that we should love one another.
verses.web: For this is the message which you heard from the beginning, that we should love one another;
verses.ct: This is the message you've heard from the very beginning: we should love one another.

verses.kjv: Not as Cain, who was of that wicked one, and slew his brother. And wherefore slew he him? Because his own works were evil, and his brother’s righteous.
verses.web: unlike Cain, who was of the evil one, and killed his brother. Why did he kill him? Because his deeds were evil, and his brother’s righteous.
verses.ct: Don't be like Cain, who belonged to the evil one and murdered his brother. And why did he murder him? Because his own actions were evil, and his brother's were righteous.

verses.kjv: Marvel not, my brethren, if the world hate you.
verses.web: Don’t be surprised, my brothers, if the world hates you.
verses.ct: Brothers and sisters, don't be surprised if the world hates you.

verses.kjv: We know that we have passed from death unto life, because we love the brethren. He that loveth not his brother abideth in death.
verses.web: We know that we have passed out of death into life, because we love the brothers. He who doesn’t love his brother remains in death.
verses.ct: We know that we have crossed over from death to life, because we love our brothers and sisters. Anyone who doesn't love remains trapped in death.

verses.kjv: Whosoever hateth his brother is a murderer: and ye know that no murderer hath eternal life abiding in him.
verses.web: Whoever hates his brother is a murderer, and you know that no murderer has eternal life remaining in him.
verses.ct: Anyone who hates a brother or sister is a murderer, and you know that no murderer has eternal life living inside them.

verses.kjv: Hereby perceive we the love of God, because he laid down his life for us: and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren.
verses.web: By this we know love, because he laid down his life for us. And we ought to lay down our lives for the brothers.
verses.ct: This is how we understand what love really is: Christ laid down his life for us. So we should be willing to lay down our lives for our brothers and sisters.

verses.kjv: But whoso hath this world’s good, and seeth his brother have need, and shutteth up his bowels of compassion from him, how dwelleth the love of God in him?
verses.web: But whoever has the world’s goods and sees his brother in need, then closes his heart of compassion against him, how does God’s love remain in him?
verses.ct: If someone has enough money to live well but sees a brother or sister in need and slams the door of their heart shut — how can God's love possibly be living in that person?

verses.kjv: My little children, let us not love in word, neither in tongue; but in deed and in truth.
verses.web: My little children, let’s not love in word only, or with the tongue only, but in deed and truth.
verses.ct: Dear children, let's not love with just words or speeches. Let's love with our actions and in truth.

verses.kjv: And hereby we know that we are of the truth, and shall assure our hearts before him.
verses.web: And by this we know that we are of the truth, and persuade our hearts before him,
verses.ct: This is how we'll know that we belong to the truth, and this is how we'll put our hearts at ease in his presence.

verses.kjv: For if our heart condemn us, God is greater than our heart, and knoweth all things.
verses.web: because if our heart condemns us, God is greater than our heart, and knows all things.
verses.ct: Even if our hearts condemn us, God is greater than our hearts, and he knows everything.

verses.kjv: Beloved, if our heart condemn us not, then have we confidence toward God.
verses.web: Beloved, if our hearts don’t condemn us, we have boldness toward God;
verses.ct: Dear friends, if our hearts don't condemn us, we can approach God with confidence.

verses.kjv: And whatsoever we ask, we receive of him, because we keep his commandments, and do those things that are pleasing in his sight.
verses.web: so whatever we ask, we receive from him, because we keep his commandments and do the things that are pleasing in his sight.
verses.ct: Whatever we ask, we receive from him, because we obey his commands and do what pleases him.

verses.kjv: And this is his commandment, That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ, and love one another, as he gave us commandment.
verses.web: This is his commandment, that we should believe in the name of his Son, Jesus Christ, and love one another, even as he commanded.
verses.ct: This is his command: that we believe in the name of his Son, Jesus Christ, and that we love one another — just as he told us to.

verses.kjv: And he that keepeth his commandments dwelleth in him, and he in him. And hereby we know that he abideth in us, by the Spirit which he hath given us.
verses.web: He who keeps his commandments remains in him, and he in him. By this we know that he remains in us, by the Spirit which he gave us.
verses.ct: Whoever obeys his commands lives in God, and God lives in them. This is how we know he remains in us — by the Holy Spirit he has given us.
